name: Working on Ubuntu
body:

#Starting Ubuntu :

There are many shortcut on ubuntu. One of them is Ctrl + Alt + T this is going to open terminal. We will use here for many times because the terminal more useful on ubuntu. Firstly we should get root permission. Because of that we will write sudo passwd
